title: Fujieda, from the series 53 Stations of the Tokaido
marks:
Signature, Title, Inscription, and Seals

LR mar LRQ; ULQ
description: a line of men, horses, and packages at center; two men are lifting a large parcel, while two others are tying down another parcel; at LL, a man is securing a large box to the side of a horse while a man behind him leans forward to adjust his boxes; another man at LL smokes and looks upward; a man in back adjusts a horse\'s straw horseshoe while two men next to him wipe the sweat from their back and brow; other men look on at R, while two men, one with a list in PL hand, talk; a man at R kneeling on a raised platform looks on
creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art and Culture
